name: Sparks (sparksthegame)
description:
Sparks is a puzzle solving game that explores an individual who has set aside his hobbies since he has become more preoccupied with a busy schedule. 

That is, until a strange turn of events causes him to ‘reconnect’ on a microscopic level. Join our protagonist as he explores objects of his passions in unusual ways and discovers new, unsuspecting friends who help him through his journey. 

A lot of people had felt drained and unmotivated following a gruelling 2 years of COVID. ‘Sparks’ hopes to rekindle lost passions through a relatable lens as the world starts to open up again.

---

Controls:

WASD to move around and Left click onto anything highlighted on the crosshair
